cmn_relative_duration.name: 5 business day at 4 p.m

sys_update_version.name: cmn_relative_duration_9d85422547e0c110e3d98a5f746d43da
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="cmn_relative_duration"><cmn_relative_duration action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><name>5 business day at 4 p.m</name><script><![CDATA[// 5 business days by 4pm if before 10am
var days = 5;
// If the current time is after 10:00, add another day
if (calculator.isAfter(calculator.startDateTime, "10:00:00")) {
   days++;
}

calculator.calcRelativeDueDate(calculator.startDateTime, days, "16:00:00");  
]]></script><sys_class_name>cmn_relative_duration</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-12-20 17:49:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>9d85422547e0c110e3d98a5f746d43da</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>5 business day at 4 p.m</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Request Management PW" source="x_713641_request_m">dfa02e7f47900110e3d98a5f746d43f5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Request Management PW">dfa02e7f47900110e3d98a5f746d43f5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>cmn_relative_duration_9d85422547e0c110e3d98a5f746d43da</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-20 17:49:17</sys_updated_on></cmn_relative_duration></record_update>
